message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm very interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $11,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $13,000 is closer, but I'm aiming for something closer to $11,500. Would that work for you?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get closer to your target. I'm willing to compromise further. I can offer it to you for $12,800.
Alice, thanks for your flexibility. To be honest, I'm running out of time and need to make a decision soon. My absolute best offer is $12,000. If that doesn't work, I'll have to go with John.
Hi Bob, I understand your urgency, but I'm still not comfortable with $12,000. I'm willing to meet you at $12,200. This is my final offer.
